contest-event.event-date: Feb. 1, 1976 D Durham League Contest (Section A) Durham League Contest (Section A) 10 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-a The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) Prelude to the Mastersingers Welfare Hall, Easington Prizes - 1st £18 and trophy, 2nd £10 and cup, 3rd £5 and trophy. 7 bands competed Dec. 4, 2012, 11:32 p.m. Jan. 20, 2017, 7:55 p.m. 1 Reg Vardy Band Eric Cunningham 2 Crookhall Colliery Peter Kitson 3 Westoe Band Ray White Unknown Result NASUWT Riverside George Holden Unknown Result Yarm & District Band Cliff Midgley Unknown Result Easington Colliery Band Cecil Peacock Unknown Result Fishburn Band Jim Foxcroft
